title: OnePlus 8 Pro review: high expectations
description: The OnePlus 8 Pro is the first OnePlus phone with wireless charging. It has 5G, a 120Hz refresh rate on the display, and it's super fast. It's the phone designed to take on the Samsung Galaxy S20, and it more than holds its own. Just a little more work on the camera and it's there.
